languages.text: "Ты была обманута, сестра. Калькасар присвоил наши разработки. Продолжил изучать их, уже не сдержанный каноном Омниссии. А ты потворствовала ему, уничтожая тех, кто мог вернуться и заявить права на его кровавую добычу".

"You were deceived, sister. Calcazar appropriated our work. He continued our research, no longer bound by the Omnissiah's canon. And you enabled him by destroying those who could return and reclaim his bloodied prize."
languages.original_text: "Ты была обманута, сестра. Калькасар присвоил наши разработки. Продолжил изучать их, уже не сдержанный каноном Омниссии. А ты потворствовала ему, уничтожая тех, кто мог вернуться и заявить права на его кровавую добычу".

traits.locale_text: "You were lied to, sister. Calcazar appropriated our work. He continued researching it, no longer bound by the Omnissiah's canon. And you enabled him by destroying those who could return and claim back his bloodied loot."
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

traits.locale_text: "You were lied to, sister. Calcazar appropriated our work. He continued researching it, no longer bound by the Omnissiah's canon. And you enabled him by destroying those who could return and claim back his bloodied loot."
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

traits.locale_text: "You were deceived, sister. Calcazar appropriated our work. He continued our research, no longer bound by the Omnissiah's canon. And you enabled him by destroying those who could return and reclaim his bloodied prize."
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

traits.locale_text: "You were deceived, sister. Calcazar appropriated our work. He continued our research, no longer bound by the Omnissiah's canon. And you enabled him by destroying those who could return and reclaim his bloodied prize."
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: 「欺かれていたのはあなただ、ニヘル。カルカサルは自分たちの研究結果を利用した。万機神の聖典に縛られない研究を自分たちに続けさせた。あなたがカルカサルにそうさせたのだ、血塗れの褒美を手にする可能性がある者を殺して」
languages.original_text: "You were deceived, sister. Calcazar appropriated our work. He continued our research, no longer bound by the Omnissiah's canon. And you enabled him by destroying those who could return and reclaim his bloodied prize."

traits.locale_text: 「欺かれていたのはあなただ、ニヘル。カルカサルは自分たちの研究結果を利用した。万機神の聖典に縛られない研究を自分たちに続けさせた。あなたがカルカサルにそうさせたのだ、血塗れの褒美を手にする可能性がある者を殺して」
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: “你被骗了，姐妹，卡尔卡扎窃取了我们的成果。他一直在继续进行我们的研究，却不再受欧姆尼塞亚圣典的约束。你只是帮助他清除了他的障碍，消灭了那些能从他手中夺回血腥战利品的人。”
languages.original_text: "You were deceived, sister. Calcazar appropriated our work. He continued our research, no longer bound by the Omnissiah's canon. And you enabled him by destroying those who could return and reclaim his bloodied prize."

traits.locale_text: “你被骗了，姐妹，卡尔卡扎窃取了我们的成果。他一直在继续进行我们的研究，却不再受欧姆尼塞亚圣典的约束。你只是帮助他清除了他的障碍，消灭了那些能从他手中夺回血腥战利品的人。”
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: « On vous a menti, ma sœur. Calcazar s'est approprié nos travaux. Il a poursuivi nos recherches, sans être limité par le canon de l'Omnimessie. Et vous l'avez encouragé en détruisant ceux qui auraient pu venir réclamer son prix sanglant. »
languages.original_text: "You were deceived, sister. Calcazar appropriated our work. He continued our research, no longer bound by the Omnissiah's canon. And you enabled him by destroying those who could return and reclaim his bloodied prize."

traits.locale_text: « On vous a menti, ma sœur. Calcazar s'est approprié nos travaux. Il a poursuivi nos recherches, sans être limité par le canon de l'Omnimessie. Et vous l'avez encouragé en détruisant ceux qui auraient pu venir réclamer son prix sanglant. »
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: «Te engañaron, hermana. Calcazar se apropió de nuestro trabajo. Continuó nuestra investigación sin seguir los preceptos del Omnissiah. Y tú se lo permitiste al destruir a los que podían volver a reclamar su sangriento premio».
languages.original_text: "You were deceived, sister. Calcazar appropriated our work. He continued our research, no longer bound by the Omnissiah's canon. And you enabled him by destroying those who could return and reclaim his bloodied prize."

traits.locale_text: «Te engañaron, hermana. Calcazar se apropió de nuestro trabajo. Continuó nuestra investigación sin seguir los preceptos del Omnissiah. Y tú se lo permitiste al destruir a los que podían volver a reclamar su sangriento premio».
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: "Ihr wurdet getäuscht, Schwester. Calcazar hat sich unsere Arbeit angeeignet. Er hat unsere Forschungen fortgeführt, nicht länger an den Kanon des Omnissiah gebunden. Und Ihr habt ihn unterstützt, indem Ihr jene vernichtet habt, die zurückkehren und seinen blutigen Preis hätten zurückerobern können."
languages.original_text: "You were deceived, sister. Calcazar appropriated our work. He continued our research, no longer bound by the Omnissiah's canon. And you enabled him by destroying those who could return and reclaim his bloodied prize."

traits.locale_text: "Ihr wurdet getäuscht, Schwester. Calcazar hat sich unsere Arbeit angeeignet. Er hat unsere Forschungen fortgeführt, nicht länger an den Kanon des Omnissiah gebunden. Und Ihr habt ihn unterstützt, indem Ihr jene vernichtet habt, die zurückkehren und seinen blutigen Preis hätten zurückerobern können."
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: "Kandırılmışsın kardeşim. Calcazar, çalışmalarımıza el koydu. Araştırmamızı, Hermesih'in nizamnamelerinin sınırlamaları olmaksızın devam ettirdi. Sen de dönüp kan buladığı o ganimetini elinden alabilecekleri ortadan kaldırarak ona imkân sağladın."
languages.original_text: "You were deceived, sister. Calcazar appropriated our work. He continued our research, no longer bound by the Omnissiah's canon. And you enabled him by destroying those who could return and reclaim his bloodied prize."

traits.locale_text: "Kandırılmışsın kardeşim. Calcazar çalışmalarımıza el koydu. Araştırmamızı, Hermesih'in emirleriyle bağını kopararak devam ettirdi. Ve sen de geri dönüp, onun o kana bulanmış ganimetini geri alabilecek olanları yok ederek ona imkân sağladın."
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion
